full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Active Locations
title: Validate birthdate and location steps during onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro proceeds to sign up a new account
On the "Let's add your date of birth" screen, tap "Next" without entering anything
custom_steps_separated.expected:
A "Please enter your birthdate" error message should display

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/klm12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666601)

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro proceed to enter a birthdate to less than 18
custom_steps_separated.expected:
A "you need to be at least 18 years old" error message should display
Pro will need to reenter a valid birthdate to proceed

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/klm12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666602)

custom_steps_separated.content: On "Where do you live" screen, tap "Next" without entering anything
custom_steps_separated.expected:
A "This field is required" error message should display

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/klm12345-3333-4444-5555-666666666603)
